originalText.text: I LOVE everything about this company and the owner.  From the moment I found her designs online up until I received them , Paradise went above and beyond to communicate with me and make sure I received the most excellent costumer care and perfects designs!  She went out of her way to make sure she had my measurements right and even offered a design that wasn‚Äôt on her website after she realized she may have more options for what I was looking for.  I‚Äôm obsessed with my elegant coat and onsie.   I would recommend her work and designs to everyone.  I like unique one of a kind experiences and she will make sure you get exactly what you are looking for without breaking the bank.  I look forward to ordering some of her exquisite makeup line and wine next. Simply the best!! üëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèª

originalText.text: Had the Les Deesses 2017 and it was one of the most delicious wines I‚Äôve had at this price point. The acidity and lightness was just delightful. Went perfectly with a steak. I cannot recommend Artemis enough!

text.text: Had the Les Deesses 2017 and it was one of the most delicious wines I‚Äôve had at this price point. The acidity and lightness was just delightful. Went perfectly with a steak. I cannot recommend Artemis enough!

originalText.text: Ordered a pair of workout shorts and immediately got a response from the owner asking for specifications and needs. They arrived in less than 2 weeks! From order to delivery, the entire process was neat and professional. The shorts are amazing and fit better than most of the more expensive for no reason brands. Highly recommend and totally will be ordering from this company again!

originalText.text:
Okay so let me first sat that I am not big on doing reviews, how ever I really wanted to do it this for this make up.

I got the Warrior palette because 33%of  proceeds go to fight for better resources for Veterans and Single Parents. I thought that this was a great cause so why not.

THIS product does not disappoint !!! It is Hella pigmentated and as a woman of color that is extra important, so I don't have to apply so much. Love not looking like cake .

P.s The photo of me on a pillow is after a 4hr nap, and this make up still looks amazing. I highly recommend giving this company a try.

originalText.text: Absolutely in love with this wine! The 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon is beautifully dry with hints of cherry and vanilla! I personally don‚Äôt like sweet wine so this is perfect for me. I got my order within a week and the owner was so sweet and helped me pick out the perfect wine! It‚Äôs 100% worth every penny!
